Plot: Comedy troupe The Yes Men stage phony events and press releases in an effort to bring attention to environmental dangers and corporate greed.
Title: The Yes Men Are Revolting
Writer: Laura Nix, Andy Bichlbaum, Mike Bonanno
Director: Andy Bichlbaum, Mike Bonanno, Laura Nix
Actors: Mike Bonanno, Andy Bichlbaum, Benadette Chandia Kodili, Albert Mwesigwa
